name: Julian LaNeve
summary: Product & engineering leader who enjoys building tight feedback loops between customers and products.
work_history: Astronomer (Chief Technology Officer, November 2023 - Present, New York, New York, United States): Making it easier to write and run data pipelines with Apache Airflow and Astro. Senior Product Manager (January 2023 - November 2023, New York City Metropolitan Area): Product & engineering for all of developer experience, data observability, and open-source software initiatives. Product Manager (January 2022 - January 2023, New York, United States): Product & engineering to launch the Cloud IDE from inception, a notebook tool for writing data pipelines. Boston Consulting Group (BCG) (Summer Associate / Independent Contractor, March 2019 - August 2021, Dallas, Texas, United States): Worked with BCG from freshman year onwards as an independent contractor and summer associate, part-time during the academic year and full-time over summer. Drove transformation for top 3 grocery chain resulting in $2b savings across 2 years. Increased reliability and customer satisfaction 3x for US-based energy utility provider in 1 year.
project_history: 1st Place, ASA DataFest Re-Visited; Mayer Research Fellow; 1st Place, TAMU Datathon; 1st Place, HackLBS; 3rd Place, Citadel Data Open
education: Southern Methodist University: BBA, Finance; BS, Applied Mathematics; BS, Statistics; Minor, Mgmt Science. University of North Texas: High School, Texas Academy of Math and Science, Computer Science Specialization
